title: Publications
text:
List of publications and preprints
Huang S, Pfister N, Bowden J (2024). “Sparse Causal Effect Estimation using Two-Sample Summary Statistics in the Presence of Unmeasured Confounding.” arXiv preprint arXiv:2410.12300. doi.
Huang S, Peters J, Pfister N (2024). “Causal Change Point Detection and Localization.” arXiv preprint arXiv:2403.12677. doi.
Huang S, Ailer E, Kilbertus N, Pfister N (2023). “Supervised learning and model analysis with compositional data.” PLOS Computational Biology, 19(6), e1011240. doi.
Huang S, Wolkowicz H (2018). “Low-rank matrix completion using nuclear norm minimization and facial reduction.” Journal of Global Optimization, 72(1), 5-26. doi.
El Khatib A, Huang S, Ghodsi A, Karray F (2018). “Nonnegative matrix factorization using autoencoders and exponentiated gradient descent.” In 2018 International Joint Conference on Neural Networks (IJCNN), 1-8. IEEE. doi.


Presentations
Huang S (2022). “Supervised Learning and Model Analysis with Compositional Data.” Student Travel Award, ICSDS 2022, Florence, Italy (slides).
Huang S (2023). “Causal change point detection and localization.” EMS 2023, Warsaw, Poland (slides).

title: Shimeng Huang
text:
Hi, my name is Shimeng. I’m currently a PhD candidate in Statistics at the University of Copenhagen under the supervision of Niklas Pfister and Jonas Peters. I’m a member of the Copenhagen Causality Lab (CoCaLa).


News

🎉 I’ll join as a postdoc at the Institute of Science and Technology Austria (ISTA) working with Francesco Locatello and Matthew Robinson in Feb. 2025!
📙 I submitted my PhD thesis in Dec. 2024 and it is now publicly available!
🧬 I completed a research internship at Novo Nordisk (Apr.-Aug. 2024) in Copenhagen, Denmark.
💡 I finished a data scientist internship with Google France (Sep.-Nov. 2023) in Paris, France.

title: Biography
text:
Education

PhD in Statistics, University of Copenhagen, Denmark, Sep. 2021 – Present
MMath in Statistics, University of Waterloo, Canada, Sep. 2017 – Dec. 2018
BMath in Computational Mathematics joint Statistics, University of Waterloo, Canada, Sep. 2016 – June 2017
BA in Mathematical Economics, University of Waterloo, Canada, Sep. 2014 – June 2016



Work

Guest Researcher, Novo Nordisk, Copenhagen, Denmark, Apr. 2024 – Aug. 2024
Data Scientist (intern), Google France, Paris, France, Sep. 2023 – Nov. 2023
Statistical Programmer & Data Scientist, Hoffmann-La Roche, Mississauga, ON, Canada, Jan. 2019 – Jun. 2021



Languages

English
Mandarin Chinese



Personal background
I was born and raised in Tianjin, China, and my name in Chinese characters is 黄诗萌. In September 2012, I moved to Beijing to start my undergraduate study in Economics at Beijing Jiaotong University. In July 2014, I continued my study at the University of Waterloo, Canada. After spending some enjoyable years there and in the Greater Toronto Area (Mississauga and Toronto, specifically) for study and work, I decided to move to Copenhagen, Denmark, to pursue my PhD degree in September 2021.

title: Software
text:
Python and R packages
Huang S, Kook L (2024). “pycomets.” Python package available on GitHub.
Huang S, Ailer E, Pfister N, Kilbertus N (2022). “kernelbiome.” Python package available on PyPI.
Huang S, Winstein K (2021). “rbscCI.” R package available on CRAN.
Huang S, Lysy M (2020). “flexEL.” R package available on GitHub.


Other contributed packages
Straub B, Bundfuss S, Dickinson J, Farrugia R, Gautier F, Gayatri G, Chakma A, Kulkarni D, Mancini E, Mascary S, Miller G, Patil L, Shapcott S, Simms E, Sjoberg D, Thoma S, Webster P, Zhang K, Zhu Z, F. Hoffmann-La Roche AG, GlaxoSmithKline LLC (2024). “admiral.” R package available on CRAN.
